text: Richard Edward "Dick" Gernert (September 28, 1928 – November 30, 2017) was an American professional baseball player. He was a first baseman and outfielder in Major League Baseball. He played for the Boston Red Sox (1952–59), Chicago Cubs (1960), Detroit Tigers (1960–61), Cincinnati Reds (1961) and Houston Astros (1962). He was born in Reading, Pennsylvania. Gernert died on November 30, 2017 in Reading, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: Dick Gernert
